EmailTemplate.subject: Hadoop Native SQL Webinar Series: Only 3 webinars left!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://hortonworks.com/webinars/#upcoming/?utm_partner=pivotal&utm_source=hbdweb.]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
If you’re interested in learning how to run data science and machine learning workloads at scale on Hadoop, you can’t afford to miss this five-part webinar series from Pivotal, the company accelerating digital transformation for enterprises, and Hortonworks, the leader in enterprise Hadoop. The series covers HDB, the Hadoop Native SQL database for analytics powered by Apache HAWQ (incubating), from end to end. Register today for:
- October 19, 10am PDT: How to Manage Hortonworks HDB Resources with YARN <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/how-to-manage-hortonworks-hdb-resources-with-yarn/]]> - November 2, 10am PDT: How to Get Started with Apache MADlib on Hortonworks HDB <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/apache-madlib-hortonworks-hdb/]]> - November 16, 10am PST: How to use Apache Zeppelin with Hortonworks HDB <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/use-apache-zeppelin-hortonworks-hdb/]]>
Parts one and two of the series, covering how to install HDB <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/install-hdb-hdp/]]> and how to query external data from HDB <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/use-pxf-hortonworks-hdb/]]>, respectively, are already available on demand here <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinars/#library]]>. Also check out this related webinar, High-Performance Interactive SQL Analytics on Hadoop <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/high-performance-interactive-sql-analytics-machine-learning-hadoop/]]>, that serves as a good introduction to the topic. Parts three <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/how-to-manage-hortonworks-hdb-resources-with-yarn/]]>, four <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/apache-madlib-hortonworks-hdb/]]> and five <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/use-apache-zeppelin-hortonworks-hdb/]]> of the series are coming up fast, so register today to tune in live. That way you’ll also have the opportunity to ask questions during the interactive broadcasts!
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
